item.title: WifineticTwo
item.description: INTRODUCTION As the 11th box of HTB’s Season IV, “Savage Lands”, WifineticTwo was released mid-March 2024. Although it’s officially rated as medium difficulty, it’s definitely on the easier side of medium. The skills required to root this box are pretty minimal, but it does require a little out of the box thinking. This box was a lot of fun, in the end. Take the name as a hint 😉 Upon starting the box, OpenPLC is the first thing you’ll notice.
